meanings.sent1: I always misdial my friend's number and end up calling the wrong person.
meanings.sent2: If you misdial the number, just try again until you get it right.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally misdial my own number sometimes, and it's quite funny.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers seemed to have a mind of their own, causing her to constantly misdial.
meanings.sent5: The toddler's attempt to dial the phone often resulted in a cute little misdial.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake when dialing a telephone number.
meanings.sent1: Don't worry if you misdial, just double-check the number and try again.
meanings.sent2: She realized she had misdialled when a stranger answered the phone.
meanings.sent3: He always manages to misdial when he's in a rush, which leads to funny conversations.
meanings.sent4: The old phone was so sensitive that even a slight tremor could cause a misdial.
meanings.sent5: After the third misdial, she decided to ask for help in saving the correct number.
